00020     public class StartGame : GameState
00021     {
00022         #region Fields
00023         private Texture2D maskTexture;
00024         private GameState myGame;
00025         private bool isPause = false;
00026         private Vector2 pausePos;
00027         private float fontEffect = 0.0f;
00028         #endregion
00029 
00030         #region Initialization
00031         public StartGame()
00032         { }
00033 
00034         protected override void Initialize()
00035         {
00036             //data = new SharedData();
00037             pausePos = new Vector2(_GLOBAL.Viewport.Width / 2 - 100, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height / 2 - 50);
00038             myGame = new MapLoader(new MapXml()).loadMap("stage1.xml");
00039 
00040             _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.activate(myGame);
00041         }
00042         #endregion
00043 
00044         #region Contents
00045         internal override void LoadContent()
00046         {
00047             maskTexture = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>("sprites//dot");
00048         }
00049 
00050         protected override void UnloadContent() 
00051         {
00052             _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.GameStates.Remove(myGame);
00053         }
00054         #endregion
00055 
00056         #region Update and Draw
00057         internal override void Update(GameTime gameTime)
00058         {
00059             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState = Keyboard.GetState();
00060 
00061             NeedUpdate = true;
00062             NeedDraw = true;
00063             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyPause())
00064                 pause(myGame);
00065 
00066             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyEscape())
00067                 return2Menu(myGame);
00068             
00069             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState.IsKeyDown(Keys.R))
00070             {
00071                 _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.GameStates.Remove(myGame);
00072                 myGame = new MapLoader(new MapXml()).loadMap("stage1.xml");
00073                 _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.activate(myGame);
00074             }
00075 
00076             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState = _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState;
00077         }
00078 
00079         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00080         {
00081             //data.Draw(gameTime);
00082             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteBlendMode.AlphaBlend);
00083             if (isPause)
00084             {
00085                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(maskTexture, _GLOBAL.ViewportRect, Color.White);
00086                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.HuakanFont, "Paused", pausePos, Color.Red, 0.0f,
00087                     Vector2.Zero, 2.0f + (float)Math.Cos(fontEffect += 0.075f) / 12, SpriteEffects.None, 0.0f);
00088             }
00089             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.End();
00090         }
00091         #endregion
00092 
00093         #region Methods
00094         private void pause(GameState srcGame)
00095         {
00096             isPause = !isPause;
00097             _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.setUpdate(myGame, !isPause);
00098         }
00099 
00100         private void return2Menu(GameState theGame)
00101         {
00102             _GLOBAL.inGameState = false;
00103 
00104             UnloadContent();
00105             _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.GameStates.Remove(this);
00106         }
00107         #endregion
00108     }
